ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker

Class ClaimListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.ClaimListController

  • public class ClaimListController
extends java.lang.Object
    When making edits to the Claim List model it should be done through this ClaimListController class.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimListController()
      Constructor just sets the claimList to the only ClaimList that exists in the app (ClaimList is a Singleton).
